page.title: 15Crowton Pony Club
page.content: In the Pony Club there are about 34 children. I joined last year. We cannot join until we are 7 and we finish when we are 10 years old. Then we join the Riding Club. When we go to the club rallies they are usually held on Saturdays. At a rally we have races and gymkhana games like bending races. We also do jumping. My pony is no good at gymkhana games but he is brilliant at jumping. I know most of the people at the rallies because they live in this area. I am going to a rally this Saturday. At the Crowton Show I won second prize in the Best Turned-Out Pony class. I won that because I learned how to look after my pony at the club.
